verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa lāgi' āra saba kare parityāga
kṛṣṇa-sukha-hetu kare śuddha anurāga

synonyms: kṛṣṇa lāgi'-for Lord Kṛṣṇa; āra—other; saba—all; kare—do; parityāga—give up; kṛṣṇa-sukha-hetu—for the purpose of Lord Kṛṣṇa's happiness; kare—do; śuddha—pure; anurāga—attachments.
translation: They renounced everything for Kṛṣṇa. They have pure attachment to giving Kṛṣṇa pleasure.
